tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: MY GIRLFRIEND! : Ask Shane #34
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: SUBSCRIBE for new Ask Shanes every Monday! Also check out Lisa's channel! www.youtube.com THANKS FOR SUBSCRIBING! :) I have 3 channels! Check em out! :) *Main Channel* www.youtube.com *2nd Channel* (vlogs & extras) www.youtube.com *iPhone Channel* (daily vlogs) www.youtube.com Hit me up on my social networks! Google+ plus.google.com Facebook www.facebook.com Twitter www.twitter.com Website www.shanedawsontv.com Tumblr http Shirts & Merch www.shanedawson.spreadshirt.com Send letters to 3727 W. Magnolia Blvd #712 Burbank, CA 91505 *Branding, Media, & General Business Inquiries: The Collective ShaneDawsonTVBiz@gmail.com *Film & Television Agent: William Morris Endeavor (310) 285-9000

tva:Genre.tva:Name: FICTION/DRAMA
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Programme consisting of a prose or verse composition, resp. one telling a story, written for or as if for performance by actors, puppets or animated

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Do one with﻿ your brotherrr
ah man I liked you better when I thought you﻿ were gay.....jk lol
she reminds me of﻿ amanda bynes
she's from﻿ MyMusic!

Want to earn﻿ more than $500 worth of iTunes, Xbox, PS3, PayPal cash, eBay, Best Buy, and/or Amazon gift card? Follow these easy steps to get started. 1. Go﻿ to app store (Android or iPhone) 2. Search ' App Trailers ' 3. Download it 4. Go to it and onto the videos tab 5. Find the bonus tab 6. Enter code 1234easy 7. You will receive code instantly after redeeming in the beginning and you'll be on you way into making money fast You can send me a message to let you know﻿ I'm not fake lol :D
fat asian guy﻿
We got Shane on Mondays﻿ and Jenna on Wednesdays <3 My life is complete
Shane's an actor, they're all actors, those are cameras﻿ and LISA, you're on DISASTER DATE!!!
what a shit intro.... :P not the﻿ original the guitar wtf..
TMNT﻿ yeah michelangelo.
start a new﻿ blog with you playing games OR ELSE!!!
When Lisa gets pregnant Shane's gonna be like "Yeah, that's﻿ right! I did the nasties with this bitch!" oh shane.....xD
Is she swedish?﻿ O_O
you﻿ guys are a good couple! LOL WE ARE FAMILY JUST LOL
stop burping﻿ in her face God Damn It!
PLEEEEEEEAAAASSSSSEEE film﻿ the birth
eh metal's wife is cheating﻿ with shane
And Neil Patrick Harris﻿ too
Thanks for subscribing Shane, I am glad you thought my shit﻿ was funny!
Lol you guys are PERFECT for﻿ each other!!!!!!!!!!!
Your﻿ girls
Random fat﻿ asian guy
Its ok ur all good ether way and have u﻿ ever been to a rave
i call, freind girl helping him out against the haters who think hes gay. it doesnt matter, but if he is, he should just come out and say it =D ﻿
Dear Shane, you and Lisa are such a cute couple!﻿ If you guys get married can I come to the wedding?

Reviewer.Books: hunger games trilogy,sonic the hedgehog comics,and fancomics on deviant art,killer pizza,witch and wizard,maximum ride,danielx alien hunter

Reviewer.Music: most christian and sonic music,skillet,pillar,and RED,etc.
